verses.verse: שִׁמְע֞וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this word הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> against בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> against you O children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the entire הַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֔ה <S%H4940><s%> against the whole family אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which הֶעֱלֵ֛יתִי <S%H5927><s%> which I brought up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> but אֶתְכֶ֣ם <S%H853><s%> יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> You only have I known מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <S%H4940><s%> of all the families הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that אֶפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> therefore I will punish עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all עֲוֹנֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5771><s%> you for all your iniquities
הֲיֵלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> walk שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> Can two יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together בִּלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> except אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo נוֹעָֽדוּ׃ <S%H3259><s%> they be agreed

הֲיִשְׁאַ֤ג <S%H7580><s%> roar אַרְיֵה֙ <S%H738><s%> Will a lion בַּיַּ֔עַר <S%H3293><s%> in the forest וְטֶ֖רֶף <S%H2964><s%> leaf אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> has ל֑וֹ הֲיִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> add כְּפִ֤יר <S%H3715><s%> lion קוֹלוֹ֙ <S%H6963><s%> aloud מִמְּעֹ֣נָת֔וֹ <S%H4585><s%> of his den בִּלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> because אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לָכָֽד׃ <S%H3920><s%> if he have taken

הֲתִפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> fall צִפּוֹר֙ <S%H6833><s%> Can a bird עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into פַּ֣ח <S%H6341><s%> in a snare הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth וּמוֹקֵ֖שׁ <S%H4170><s%> where no gin אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there לָ֑הּ הֲיַֽעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> [is] for him? shall [one] take up פַּח֙ <S%H6341><s%> a snare מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> from the earth וְלָכ֖וֹד <S%H3920><s%> and have taken לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nothing יִלְכּֽוֹד׃ <S%H3920><s%> nothing at all

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יִתָּקַ֤ע <S%H8628><s%> be blown שׁוֹפָר֙ <S%H7782><s%> Shall a trumpet בְּעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city וְעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֶחֱרָ֑דוּ <S%H2729><s%> not be afraid אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תִּהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> occurs רָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> ? shall there be evil בְּעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> in a city וַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> hath not done

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Surely לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> not יַעֲשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> will do אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> Surely the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> nothing כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> Surely אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo גָּלָ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> but he revealeth סוֹד֔וֹ <S%H5475><s%> his secret אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> unto his servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> the prophets

אַרְיֵ֥ה <S%H738><s%> The lion שָׁאָ֖ג <S%H7580><s%> hath roared מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> who will not יִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> fear אֲדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> ? the Lord יְהוִה֙ <S%H3068><s%> GOD דִּבֶּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Who לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> but יִנָּבֵֽא׃ <S%H5012><s%> who can but prophesy

הַשְׁמִ֙יעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> Publish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְמְנ֣וֹת <S%H759><s%> in the palaces בְּאַשְׁדּ֔וֹד <S%H795><s%> at Ashdod וְעַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on אַרְמְנ֖וֹת <S%H759><s%> and in the palaces בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְאִמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and say הֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> Assemble עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> yourselves upon the mountains שֹׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria וּרְא֞וּ <S%H7200><s%> and behold מְהוּמֹ֤ת <S%H4103><s%> tumults רַבּוֹת֙ <S%H7227><s%> the great בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וַעֲשׁוּקִ֖ים <S%H6217><s%> thereof and the oppressed בְּקִרְבָּֽהּ׃ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָדְע֥וּ <S%H3045><s%> For they know עֲשׂוֹת־ <S%H6213><s%> not to do נְכֹחָ֖ה <S%H5229><s%> right נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הָאֽוֹצְרִ֛ים <S%H686><s%> who store חָמָ֥ס <S%H2555><s%> up violence וָשֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> and robbery בְּאַרְמְנֽוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H759><s%> in their palaces פ

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD צַ֖ר <S%H6862><s%> An adversary וּסְבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> [there shall be] even round about הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְהוֹרִ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> and he shall bring down מִמֵּךְ֙ <S%H4480><s%> at עֻזֵּ֔ךְ <S%H5797><s%> thy strength וְנָבֹ֖זּוּ <S%H962><s%> shall be spoiled אַרְמְנוֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H759><s%> from thee and thy palaces

כֹּה֮ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after יַצִּ֨יל <S%H5337><s%> taketh out הָרֹעֶ֜ה <S%H7462><s%> As the shepherd מִפִּ֧י <S%H6310><s%> of the mouth הָאֲרִ֛י <S%H738><s%> of the lion שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> two כְרָעַ֖יִם <S%H3767><s%> legs א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְדַל־ <S%H915><s%> or a piece אֹ֑זֶן <S%H241><s%> of an ear כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> So יִנָּצְל֞וּ <S%H5337><s%> be taken out בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> so shall the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> that dwell בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> in Samaria בִּפְאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> in the corner מִטָּ֖ה <S%H4296><s%> of a bed וּבִדְמֶ֥שֶׁק <S%H1833><s%> and in Damascus עָֽרֶשׂ׃ <S%H6210><s%> [in] a couch

שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear וְהָעִ֖ידוּ <S%H5749><s%> ye and testify בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God הַצְּבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> on בְּי֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> That in the day פָּקְדִ֥י <S%H6485><s%> that I shall visit פִשְׁעֵֽי־ <S%H6588><s%> the transgressions יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וּפָֽקַדְתִּי֙ <S%H6485><s%> upon him I will also visit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מִזְבְּח֣וֹת <S%H4196><s%> the altars בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> of Bethel וְנִגְדְּעוּ֙ <S%H1438><s%> shall be cut off קַרְנ֣וֹת <S%H7161><s%> and the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar וְנָפְל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> and fall לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> to the ground

וְהִכֵּיתִ֥י <S%H5221><s%> And I will smite בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַחֹ֖רֶף <S%H2779><s%> the winter עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַקָּ֑יִץ <S%H7019><s%> with the summer וְאָבְד֞וּ <S%H6><s%> shall perish בָּתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> and the houses הַשֵּׁ֗ן <S%H8127><s%> of ivory וְסָפ֛וּ <S%H5486><s%> shall have an end בָּתִּ֥ים <S%H1004><s%> houses רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> and the great נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס
